settings.title: Settings
settings.delete_account_message: The account will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. After cancellation, the subscription service will be terminated, and billing will stop.
settings.invite_title: Invite new users and earn more credits
settings.invite_desc: For each referral of a new user to register for Nemati AI, you both will receive 20 credits!
settings.referral_desc: Directly registered friends can enter your referral code (only within 24 hours after registration) to receive 200 credits.
settings.redeem_desc: New users who directly register for Anakin can enter a friend's personal referral code to get 20 credits (only within 24 hours after registration).

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.page_title: Get Faster, Smarter, and More Done
pricing.page_subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs and unlock the full potential of our AI-powered platform.
pricing.payment_warning: BlockBee cannot reverse any payments and is not responsible for any erroneous item/service descriptions. All payments are final and forwarded directly to the merchant. Proceed with the payment only if you trust in the merchant.
pricing.description_of_how_to_pay: Please select your preferred payment method to complete your purchase securely.
